text: Brickellia reticulata is a Mexican species of flowering plants in the daisy family. It is native to the state of México in the central part of the republic of Mexico near the city of Temascaltepec.Turner, B. L. 1997. The Comps of Mexico: A systematic account of the family Asteraceae, vol. 1 – Eupatorieae. Phytologia Memoirs 11: i–iv, 1–272 ==References== ==External links== *Photo of herbarium specimen at Missouri Botanical Garden reticulata Category:Flora of the State of Mexico Category:Plants described in 1838
title: Brickellia reticulata
